original: Melinder, Arne, major, jaktvårds-konsulent, Ulricehamn, f. 22/10/90 i Gävle av gro&shandk E. j. MeHnder 0. Ellen Thalin, G. 2. 27 m. Karin Ljunggren. Barn: Anne-Marie f. 17, El,sa 21, Erik 29, ULla 32. — Stud:ex. i Djursho|lm 10, oif :ex. 14, ridsk. 16-17. Löjtn. v. Småk hus :reg. 18, rep. o. lär. v. skjutsk. 21-22 o. 23-24, ryttmäst. v. Norrl. dragonreg. 28, lär. v. AUS 29-32, reg :kvartermäst. 33-38, v. arméstaben 38-40, förtiidspens. 40, major i armén 41, landst :omr :befälh. 40-42. Jaktv:kons. i Södra Älvsb. 1. sed. 40. Ordf. i Ulricehamns landst :fören. sed. 41, Frimurarfören. Mursleven sed. 44 samt Skiidfrämj. lokalavd. sed. 45, styr:led. i STF lokailavd. -sed. 42. Hob-bies: jakt o. trädg :skötsel. RSO, Älvsb. bef :utb:förb. ftjSM, S. Älvsb. 1. jaktv:fören. ftjSM, Sv. jäg:förb. ftjt i guld.
translated: Melinder, Arne, major, hunting conservation consultant, Ulricehamn, b. 22/10/90 in Gävle, son of groceries and hardware merchant E. J. Melinder and Ellen Thalin. Married 2. 27 to Karin Ljunggren. Children: Anne-Marie b. 17, Elsa b. 21, Erik b. 29, Ulla b. 32. Education: Passed student examination in Djursholm 10, non-commissioned officer examination 14, riding school 16-17. Second lieutenant in the Småland Hussar Regiment 18, service and instructor at the shooting school 21-22 and 23-24, captain in the Norrland Dragoon Regiment 28, instructor at the Army Undersergeant School 29-32, regimental quartermaster 33-38, staff officer at the Army General Staff 38-40, retired early 40, major in the army 41, district military commander 40-42. Hunting conservation consultant in Southern Älvsborg County since 40. Chairman of the Ulricehamn County Association since 41, Freemasons' Lodge Mursleven since 44, and Ski Promotion Local Branch since 45. Board member of the Swedish Touring Club Local Branch since 42. Hobbies: hunting and gardening. Recipient of the Royal Order of the Seraphim, Älvsborg County's Outdoor Education Association Gold Medal, Southern Älvsborg County Hunting Association Gold Medal, Swedish Hunter's Association Gold Medal.

awards.name: Älvsborg County's Outdoor Education Association Gold Medal
Southern Älvsborg County Hunting Association Gold Medal
